text:
[Verse]
Golden skies fade away
In the waves we play
Sun goes down in a dance
Take my hand one last chance

[Verse 2]
Footprints in the sand
Moments so unplanned
Whispers in the breeze
Feel the evening's ease

[Chorus]
Waves and sunsets
Memories we won't forget
Time slows down
Love in this quiet town

[Verse 3]
Stars are shining bright
In the moonlit night
Hold me close don't let go
Hearts in sync we both know

[Bridge]
Every tide brings us near
In the dark no fear
Just you and me
By the endless sea

[Verse 4]
Echoes of our laughter
In the ever after
Dreams we chase so high
Like the starlit sky
title: Waves and Sunsets
